metadata.name: Eternal Garden Master Collection
metadata.description:
Immerse yourself in the lush, vibrant world of The Eternal Garden Master Collection - a sample pack blossoming with over 200 unique sounds and instruments. These sounds and instruments are plucked from a variety of genres, like the delicate blooms of a diverse garden. At the heart of the sample pack, you'll discover a wealth of one shots and loops; From shimmering synths to rich, warm vocals, each sample is a unique flower waiting to be picked and placed into your musical compositions..

This sample pack also includes official stems and excerpts directly from Eternal Garden, giving you access to the same sounds and tools used by the mastermind producer behind the critically acclaimed album. It's like having a VIP pass to wander through the Eternal Garden itself, gathering inspiration from the sounds of nature and the hum of creativity.

As a music producer, you understand the value of having a diverse and varied palette of sounds to work with, and The Eternal Garden Master Collection is a soundscape like no other.

So whether you're a seasoned producer or just starting out, this sample pack is an essential addition to your collection.

Let it bear the fruit of your greatness.  
  
Samples included in this Kit:  
 - TK_Arcadia_Drums_Loop_82_RideCymbals  
 - TK_Arcadia_Drums_Loop_82_DrivingToms  
 - TK_Arcadia_Guitar_82_Am_SoloLick
